plugin.description:
You'll need a licence of optimus.io
optimizing thumbnails with optimus.io

Converts JPG- and PNG-Images for best score in google-insights.
Supports webp-optimization, if jpg or png exists.

We recommend running the CLI-Command after installation to optimize all images in media:
php bin/console optimus:batch

serve scalled images for best result
You should consider adding following thumbnail-sizes in media manager (for SW-Responsive-Theme only):
Article: 50x50, 86x86, 170x170, 430x430
Shopping worlds: 293x293, 931x931, 1160x1160
